name: remainder
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: remainder
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the part of something that is left after the other parts have gone, been used, or been taken away

example.eg: I ate most of it and gave the remainder to the dog.
example.egtrans: 我吃了一大半，剩下的喂狗了。

example.eg: It rained the first day but the remainder of the trip was fine.
example.egtrans: 旅行中第一天下了雨，不过其余的日子天气都很好。

dsense.name: remainder
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: in mathematics, the amount that is left when one number cannot be exactly divided by another

name: remainder
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to sell a book cheaply because it has not sold well and no more copies of it will be produced
trans_examp.trans_cn: 削价出售（滞销或剩余的图书）

example.eg: His autobiography never sold very well and was soon remaindered.
example.egtrans: 他的自传一直卖得不太好，过了不久就被削价处理了。
